name: Get the Kids to School!
description:
Getting out of bed and making your way to work every morning is hard enough as it is. Adding two young school-aged kids to the mix makes it a full-blown adventure! 

So get your butt out of bed, prep yourself for work, and try to wrangle the two kids out the door - all without incurring the wrath of your impatient wife!

Note: this is just a simple demo game to simulate my morning routine (and learn RPG Maker), but I hope you have some fun with it!

Instructions

Use your arrow keys to move.
Use Enter or Spacebar to interact with an object or person.
Or use your mouse to click where you want to go, and what you want to interact with (but it won't feel like an old-school RPG anymore).
